## My Map



```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("leaflet")
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
addTiles()
View(my_map)
my_map = leaflet()
my_map = addTiles(my_map)
addMarkers(my_map, lng = -96.79, lat = 32.77, popupOptions = "Home")
addCircles(my_map, lng = -96.79, lat = 32.77, radius = 100, popupOptions = "Home")

my_map



```
